name: Drag Block Classic
description:
Drag Block Classic is a popular puzzle game,It is a new experience and design number game

Game is a classic yet innovative game! It is very simple and fascinating game, you need only drag blocks and fill out space on the map.
How to play?
1.Simply tap the star block and move it.
2.Try to complete full lines.
3.Star Blocks can't be rotated.
4.No time limits.
